verbs.description: befringe (third-person singular simple present befringes, present participle befringing, simple past and past participle befringed)

entries.meaning: To furnish or adorn with a fringe.
examples: [...] women themselves went in armour, (having a brave lasse like another Penthesilea for their leader, so befringed with gold, that they called her Golden-foot) riding astride like men [...]
